items.name: A Three Sided Peach
items.desc:
After 21 months in red wine barrels, this funky pale was refermented on peaches.
This beer is one of three fruit expressions that share the same base beer.
Best paired with a meditation on the travails of the farm workers that hand harvest these delicate fruits.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
7.8% ABV 375ml
Store Cold
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: A Three Sided Strawberry
items.desc:
After 21 months in red wine barrels, this funky pale was refermented on strawberries. This beer is one of three fruit expressions that share the same base beer.
Best paired with a meditation on the travails of the farm workers that hand harvest these delicate fruits.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
6.8% ABV 375ml
Store Cold
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Dank Goth For The Weekend
items.desc:
Our Double Hopfenweisse offers up rich banana and clove esters from the yeast, to which we have added a potent mix of the dankest Crop Year 2019 hops for a powerful, aromatic sensory experience.
8.5% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Festbier w/ Beer Kulture
items.desc:
This traditional decoction mashed Festbier was brewed in collaboration with Beer Kulture, using an heirloom lager malt.
As we celebrate the traditions that came before us, we also celebrate the new traditions that we will create together as a community.
5.8% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Idaho 7 Foudre Beer
items.desc:
Aged nine months in foudre, then dry hopped with 25g/L of Citra and Idaho 7 before bottling.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
9.2% ABV, 375ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: La Deuxième Saison Des Poires
items.desc:
Brewed with our friends from After The Harvest and Oliver's, this beer-perry hybrid is crisp, vibrant and thirst-quenching, finding harmony between classic perry flavours, yeast aromatics and hop notes. It was created by blending beer wort with pear juice and fermenting with a Saison yeast, before ageing in foudre for 10 months. A light Simcoe dry hop was then added prior to bottling.
ALC 5.4% VOL 750ML
Aroma & Flavour: Sweet pineapple and fresh green pear, accompanied by light lemony sourness and underpinned by light cereal malt character
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry with prickly carbonation
Aftertaste: Spice and doughy white bread mingle with pine and herbal hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Mosaic Foudre Beer
items.desc:
Aged nine months in foudre, then dry hopped with 25g/L of Citra and Mosaic before bottling.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
9.2% ABV, 375ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
*If more than 1 ordered, orders will be reduced or cancelled*
*Discounts will not be applied to this item*

items.name: My Poems Are Not Poems
items.desc:
A blended foudre beer
This beer is a blend of two foudre beers, one flavoured by an extended steeping of chuckleberries, and the other by macerating freshly-harvested plums for three months. This combination adds a breadth of flavour, without adding weight.
Light and fresh, best paired with becoming still enough that birds and flying insects are not disturbed by your presence.
ALC 5.6% VOL 375ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Other People Are Not Me
items.desc:
A foudre beer with native chuckleberries.
The origins of this beer lead us back to our 2017 collaboration with De Garde, a masterful brewery in Tillamook, OR devoted to spontaneous beers. Their house culture, after 30 months and two light refermentations in foudre, leaves its mark under a four-month long 500g/l refermentation on native chuckleberries.
﻿Store Cold
ALC 5.4% VOL 750ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Sabro Foudre Beer
items.desc:
Aged nine months in foudre, then dry hopped with 25g/L of Citra and Sabro before bottling.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
9.2% ABV, 375ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
*If more than 1 ordered, orders will be reduced or cancelled*
*Discounts will not be applied to this item*

items.name: Search For Meaning
items.desc:
Combining elements from classic Belgian Kriek and juicy Beaujolais wines, this is one of our most vibrant, fruited beers to date. Organic Turkish morello cherries were submitted to a process of carbonic maceration, before blending with four-year aged beer from red wine barrels at a rate of one kilo per litre.
Best paired with a random act of kindness.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
7.4% ABV, 750ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
*If more than 2 ordered, orders will be reduced or cancelled*
*Discounts will not be applied to this item*

items.name: Smiles Through The Ages
items.desc:
Rich, complex malt flavours meld with fruity yeast esters to create an experience that is indulgent but still finely balanced. Our take on a classic Belgian Dubbel, infused with spirit notes after a short spell in Armagnac casks to provide roundness and an even greater level of depth, knitting together the different elements.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
7.6% ABV, 375ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
*If more than 1 ordered, orders will be reduced or cancelled*
*Discounts will not be applied to this item*

items.name: The Details of Mortality
items.desc:
A blend of pale ales aged in red and white wine barrels for two years. Bright citrus and spritzy Brett complexity.
Best paired with a reflection on the infinite, boundless energy that is part of every being.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
4.9% ABV, 375ml

items.name: The Passing of Time
items.desc:
This beer is a raspberry, peach and lavender sour ale, blended from a mix of red and white wine barrels and foudre-aged beer. Bright and radiant.
Best paired with recalling a time of pure, unadulterated bliss.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
to be stored upright and kept cold
5.8% ABV, 750ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Tufts Of Twine In Upper Moutere
items.desc:
When the last of the hops are harvested, the cables that held the weight of many hop bines are left punctuated by tufts of twine. Pilsner is a style that provides space to showcase hop varietals that are subtle in character, and is a perfect choice for punctuating more assertive beers, with its bright, light, refreshing qualities.
4.6% ABV, 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Herbal notes, a squeeze of fresh lemon and ripe red apple, underpinned by a cracker malt base
Body: Light and clean, with a crisp, dry finish
Aftertaste: Crushed black pepper and herbal notes, fresh white bread, light pithy bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Who Is The Other?
items.desc:
Originally a Double IPA, this beer was racked into one of our five thousand litre Italian foudres for 6 months on our house mixed ferm culture, before being dry hopped with hand-selected CY19 Simcoe.
Fresh and vibrant now, further biotransformation is likely to produce greater complexity.
Best paired with a reflection on the oneness of all beings, and a question - who is the other?
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
*Only available from London for Local Delivery or Click & Collect*
ALC 9.2% VOL 375ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Within Reach
items.desc:
Aged in foudre for nine months, and then refermented on passion fruit, raspberry and mango. Refreshing, dry, and spritzy with an underlying Brett presence, and a full fruit expression.
Best paired with a reflection on your deepest most needs - everything
may already be within reach.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
10.7% ABV, 750ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
